field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable this zone.

field.label: Zone Name
field.help: Set the name for this zone. Both forward and reverse zones may be specified, i.e. example.com or 0.168.192.in-addr.arpa.

field.label: Forward
field.help: The only value causes the lookup to fail after trying the forwarders and getting no answer, while first allows a normal lookup to be tried.

field.label: Forwarders
field.help: Set one or more hosts to send your DNS queries if the request is unknown. Create them first on the Forwarders Page
